titles.title: Baseball Antitrust Restoration Amendment of 1993
To amend the Act of September 30, 1961, to exclude professional baseball from the antitrust exemption applicable to certain television contracts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 3/31/1993--Introduced. Baseball Antitrust Restoration Amendment of 1993 - Excludes professional baseball from the antitrust exemption applicable to the telecasting of professional sports contests.
